screen_heading: How would you like to get this item?

bunny_delivery.heading: Deliver it to me with BunnyRents
bunny_delivery.desc: BunnyRents will make sure to inspect the item's condition before the rental starts.

local_delivery.heading: Local pick up (No delivery fee)
local_delivery.desc: You are responsible to inspect the item's status before you accept the rent and pickup the item on time from a pickup location.
local_delivery.hint: Meet up with the renter to pick up
local_delivery.hint_note: BunnyRents is not responsible on item's condition or inspection
